name: Depurrsion
description:
this game was my very first project and is quite rough around the edges

controls:

-arrows to move

-Z to interact

-X to interact with doors (change area)

-C to go stealth mode

each day has an objective to complete, if you do you may find a secret object on the game. you also have to be somewhat wary of hunger and bathroom breaks (but not that much because that was a bad idea to implement so i made it easy to ignore). 

Day1- eat the hamburgers!

Day2- squish the cockroaches(be wary of ripping the trash bags)

Day3- Hunt 3 animals (stealth required)

Day4- Chase the rats!

Day5-Break the spinning vases while surviving the Catnip trip

Day6-Survive
